events.name: Making Toys and Games
events.description:
Join our makers and get your hands dirty as you Make your own toys and games. Simple Science toys that illustrate energy conversion, tearing down old toys, old style kampung games and more. Learn maker skills such as using hand and power tools as well. 

Maker workshops are great avenues where kids (and parents) can learn more about the power to Science, Technology, Engineering, Art and Maths (STEAM) and how STEAM gives our children the Power to Create. Learn about electronics, Engineering, Biology and much more through hands on, open ended exploration facilitated by passionate and enthusiastic mentors!‚Äù

events.name: Game of KWAD!
events.description: Taking inspiration from Rotor Riot's game of KWAD - https://youtu.be/H3z63Eo5MrQ Rules to be determined on the day, by the organiser, but the general idea is "one upmanship" with freestyle tricks. Open to all, but be confident with Acro mode if you're going to compete, and keep your vtx off during the competition if you're not flying. More details to follow. RSVP to show your interest!
events.location: Holland Village FPV Space, 17 Holland Drive, Singapore
